description: This course develops analytical skills in relation to framed structures, facade materials and construction systems, and envelope detailing and technical documentation. Students investigate gridded structures and facade systems through activities and assignments that also develop skills in code compliance, environmental performance analysis and design detailing for medium to large-scale buildings.
prerequisites: Year 1 of the Bachelor of Architectural Design or equivalent
restricted: Admission to the Bachelor of Architectural Design. Study abroad students must seek Head of School's permission to enrol.
